__e: But, of course, your friends may be smarter than mine.
Proving once again that we are smarter than the cops.
I don't think they're smarter than anyone else... but they have courage.
Some people are smart enough to be afraid of me, you know.
I hope so, but I don't know. People are smarter than you think.
As long as we're being investigated by our own government I don't see why we should be any more clever than that.
They were smart. It wasn't system-wide.
I went by their place last night, but they're smart enough not to go home.
I have killed people smarter and younger than you.
Think they were being smart taking the sheets, or did they just get off sleeping on 'em?
They're smart, and they're animals, and they could be anywhere at anytime, and if you think that one gun and one bullet is gonna stop them... think again.
